testcase.classname: F01_Register | User should be able to register to the system
testcase.name: User Register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to Register Page........................................passed When User enter valid data..................................................passed Then user should register successfully......................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | user login to e-commerce website
testcase.name: User could Log in with valid email and password and could Logout
testcase.system-out: Given user open the login page..............................................passed When user enter valid Email and Password....................................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user should be login successfully......................................passed And User click on logout button.............................................passed Then User could logout successfully.........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | user login to e-commerce website
testcase.name: User should not log in with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user2 open the login page.............................................passed When user2 enter valid Email and Password...................................passed And user2 click on login button.............................................passed Then user2 should not login successfully....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_Search | Logged users could Search products
testcase.name: Logged user could search using product name
testcase.failure:
Given user clicked on Login & enter valid Email and Password................passed When user click on search box and write "book"..............................passed And user press on the search button.........................................passed Then "book" should appear successfully......................................failed

testcase.classname: User should be able to change currency between US and Euro currencies

testcase.system-out: When User click on Currency drop-down-list and select Euro..................passed Then Euro Symbol is shown on the 4 products displayed in Home page..........passed

testcase.classname: F05_Forget Password | user could reset the password
testcase.name: User could reset the password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user click on forgot password...........................................passed When user enters his registered email.......................................passed And press on Recover button.................................................passed Then user should reset his password successfully............................passed

failure.message: The following asserts failed: error expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/]

testcase.failure:
